tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: \"Dr. Pankaj is an exceptional dentist who truly cares about their patients' well-being. Their expertise, combined with a gentle touch and clear explanations, made my visit stress-free. The office staff were friendly and efficient, making the entire experience seamless. I appreciated the time taken to address my concerns and the personalized treatment plan. My teeth have never felt cleaner! I highly recommend Dr. Pankaj to anyone seeking top-notch dental care. They are a true professional with a passion for delivering outstanding results.\

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently visited Dr Pankaj Savla] at  Dental House and I couldn't be more pleased with the experience. From the moment I walked in, the staff was welcoming and professional. 

Dr Pankaj was incredibly ************* *** took the time to explain every procedure thoroughly. They were gentle, patient, and made sure I was comfortable throughout my visit. The quality of care I received was outstanding, and I felt truly valued as a patient.

I highly recommend Dr Pankaj Savla to anyone looking for a skilled and compassionate dentist. I will definitely be returning for all my future dental needs.
Thank you so much for your precious time

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
The doctor is very friendly with his patients and also guides us the proper process to ensure 
the patient get his dental problem cured. Not only this he also makes the patient comfortable during the treatment

Charges  - while i had 2 experiences here 1 - In January i visited him and informed him that i just had 10 days to get all the dental health checkup n treatment done as I had to move out of India and he did an excellent work setting it up and the charges wer also ok

2 - I just visited him recently for another treatment which was pending during the first visit, and honestly i did expect an increase in his charges to some extent due to additonal safety's measures but then when I came to know the actual fact the rates charged to me were exactly doubled than the rate which was charged to my uncle for the same treatment pre COVID. I didn't raise this to him as I had already agreed the rates after which I came to know about this, so would request the doctor to revisit the charges for the future treatment. 

However this does not undermine the fact that his treatment is very good and recommended to anyone with a dental problem
reply_text:
Hi pratik thanks for the  positive feedback. We definitely enjoyed doing your treatment. 

Talking about the treatment charges query, i think you have a misconception. Rates have been increased by only 10 to 15 percent average as compared to pre covid due to additional safety measures and increased cost in general of everything. 
I could have showed you your uncle's treatment charges as well if you would have asked me, we have nothing to hide. 🙂

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ** *** **** ****** *** really friendly doctor and does his treatment very nice
I would recommend everyone to visit for there dental treatment to doc pankaj

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: This was an emergency visit to Dr.Pankaj Savla's clinic on the evening of Dhanteras. I was with my friends at a dinner party, and my front tooth which was partially artificial came off while eating as I bit on a chicken bone very hard. It was so embarassing as I couldn't smile properly. It was 9pm at night, but I took a chance and I called Dr.Pankaj while he was attending his last patient for the day and was supposed to catch up with his family after that. But he agreed to treat me instead. I immediately left from my dinner party to him. He got it done in 20 mins and I was back for the dinner within an hour smiling broadly as if nothing happened. Really appreciate Dr.Pankaj's attitude towards his patients and I highly recommend him as your regular dentist.

Dr . Pankaj listen, do examination and try to understand your problem as per your requirement and apply his experience to suggest solution. Oral hygiene is must and he give time to make you understand.

If we value our health your doctor help you better. Dr. Pankaj is one who guide and consultant as true professional.
